meanings.definition: A small car that is smaller than a compact car.
meanings.sent1: I drive a subcompact to work every day.
meanings.sent2: The subcompact was perfect for navigating through the narrow streets.
meanings.sent3: The subcompact car looked like a toy on the road.
meanings.sent4: Her purse was so tiny, it could fit in the subcompact's glove compartment.
meanings.sent5: The subcompact zipped around the city like a nimble mouse.

meanings.definition: To make something smaller in size.
meanings.sent1: She decided to subcompact the furniture to fit it in the small room.
meanings.sent2: The designer subcompacted the logo to fit on the tiny label.
meanings.sent3: He subcompacted the text to make the document more concise.
meanings.sent4: The chef subcompacted the recipe to fit on the small recipe card.
meanings.sent5: The tailor subcompacted the dress to fit the petite model perfectly.
